name: Montezuma 2: Again!
overview: New sequel with new levels and improved graphics starring Panama Joe. Inside a labyrinthine pyramid, Panama Joe will explore from room to room filled with enemies, obstacles, traps and dangers. The objective is to score points by gathering jewels along the way. Panama Joe must find keys to open doors, collect and use equipment such as torches, shields and amulets, without losing his life. Obstacles are laser gates, conveyor belts, disappearing floors and fire pits.
